headline: ExxonMobil Stock: Buy, Sell, or Hold?
summary: ExxonMobil (NYSE: XOM) has been a surprising stock market winner this year.  Despite sluggish energy prices and the broader sector taking a back seat to the excitement in high-growth technology companies, shares of Exxon are up 20% thus far in 2024 and near its all-time high.  The oil and gas giant continues to deliver solid financial results, reaffirming its blue chip status with a long history of generating positive shareholder returns.
